glsa.title: Gaim: Denial of Service vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Gaim contains two remote Denial of Service vulnerabilities.

background.p: Gaim is a full featured instant messaging client which handles a variety of instant messaging protocols.

description.p: Jacopo Ottaviani discovered a vulnerability in the Yahoo! file transfer code when being offered files with names containing non-ASCII characters (CAN-2005-1269).
Hugo de Bokkenrijder discovered a vulnerability when receiving malformed MSN messages (CAN-2005-1934).

impact.p: Both vulnerabilities cause Gaim to crash, resulting in a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There are no known workarounds at this time.
